general_requirements.statewide_program_name: Electrical permits required. Building permits may be required depending on municipality. Counties have authority to zone and permit solar installations.

interconnection.net_metering_details: Net metering available for OG&E and PSO customers. Systems up to 100 kW for residential.

special_considerations.hoa_restrictions: Oklahoma Solar Rights Act (2014) prevents HOAs from prohibiting solar.
special_considerations.wind_load_requirements: Tornado Alley location. Enhanced wind loads. Design wind speeds 90-115 mph.

notes: Modest but growing solar market. OG&E and PSO offer net metering. Counties recently clarified authority over solar siting.
